entry.body:
import VideoComponent from "@c/Element/Video/Video.astro";
export const components = { video: VideoComponent };
import MDXLayer from "@l/MDXLayer.astro";
import Widget from "@w/Widget.astro";
import MDXJS from "@w/MDXJS.astro";

<MDXLayer title={frontmatter.title} description={frontmatter.description}>
<Widget img={frontmatter.img} skeleton={false}>
<MDXJS>

## Information

The premise of this piece of work is to collect musical works within the lofi genre that have a star wars like influence in their sound. 


## The Mandalorian Theme - Lofi HipHop Mix

- The Lofi Mix Tape
  - <VideoComponent
      iframe
      src="yt"
      id="GJEb6jOM07s"
      description="MANDO."
    />
  -

---
</MDXJS>
</Widget>
</MDXLayer>

data.title: StarWars Lofi
data.description: This is the way. This god tier lofi hiphop mix tape was arranged and produced by MIK x SAM and still holds as one of the best works on my playlist.
data.author: KBVE Team
